sentences.sentence: It is said that this horse ambition ascend kilocalorie Si.
sentences.translation: 据说这一匹马就要上千卡斯。

sentences.sentence: The unit of heat we shall use most frequently is the kilocalorie.
sentences.translation: 我们最常用的热量单位是千卡。

sentences.sentence: Analyzing otzi gas calorific value at 2800 ~ 2900 kilocalorie/standard cubic meters.
sentences.translation: 经分析化验，煤气热值在2800~2900千卡/标准立方米。
